comments.body: What is this set to if a CA file is specified which is empty? Wondering if `== nil` would be a better check

> What is this set to if a CA file is specified which is empty? Wondering if == nil would be a better check

I would expect the system check to be strictly better than nothing.  Otherwise, why have it be the system check?  If I had a way to do it, I would return the union of the two.

It seems that in either the empty or missing case, the information is unavailable and we'd want to fallback to the system check which should never contain a signer that you don't trust.  Its "failing" in the safe direction.
